segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a total mess with water pouring out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks filthy already, spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it—how gross to be that unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's handling dirty dishes while this flood happens behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids rummaging in the cookie jar—probably stale and grubby inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing on that stool, looking sweaty and unsteady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out like that, begging for stolen treats—yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets; the whole place will smell musty soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the garden view can't hide this indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of slipping in that nasty water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel she's using might be soaked next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secretive cookie theft just adds to the unclean vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything feels so chaotic and unappealing right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
